duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic activities, services, and repairs on automotive systems.
Road test automobiles before and after service work, and perform inspections following BSRO procedures.
Adequately explain mechanical diagnoses and needed repairs to non-mechanical individuals.
Maintain store cleanliness, orderliness, and appearance, and review maintenance/operating efficiency of tools and store equipment.
Review and maintain certifications and comply with company safety policies.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license at all times and a minimum 3 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field or demonstrated skills via third party certificates/assessment. A.S.E certification in at least 3 (three) of A1-A8 is preferred.
